title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 263.2 - Requirements for submitting material for publication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 263.2 - Requirements for submitting material for publication

State Regulations
(a) All material submitted for publication in
the State Register must comply with the style and typing standards set forth in
section
260.2
(d) of this

Title, and must comply with section
261.5
of this Title. (b) Rule making notices should be e-filed
using the application available through the department's website. (c) Any other notice or material that is
required by statute to be published in the State Register should be submitted
via e-mail to the department's register mailbox. Instructions are maintained on
the department's website. (d) Hand-delivered or mailed material must be delivered to the Division of

Administrative Rules, NYS Department of State, One Commerce Plaza, 99

Washington Avenue, Suite 650, Albany, NY 12231-0001. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
263.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
